changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.createView: select cpr.identifier as identifier, sum(case when visit.collection_status = 'Complete' then 1 else 0 end) as visits_completed, sum(case when visit.collection_status = 'Missed Collection' then 1 else 0 end) as visits_missed, sum(case when (visit.collection_status = 'Pending' or visit.identifier is null) then 1 else 0 end) as visits_pending from catissue_coll_prot_reg cpr join catissue_coll_prot_event cpe on cpe.collection_protocol_id = cpr.collection_protocol_id and cpe.activity_status!= 'Disabled' left join catissue_specimen_coll_group visit on visit.collection_protocol_event_id = cpe.identifier and visit.collection_protocol_reg_id = cpr.identifier and visit.activity_status!= 'Disabled' group by cpr.identifier

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.createView: select cpr.identifier as identifier, sum(case when spmn.collection_status = 'Collected' then 1 else 0 end) as specimens_collected, sum(case when spmn.collection_status = 'Missed Collection' then 1 else 0 end) as specimens_missed, sum(case when (spmn.identifier is null or spmn.collection_status = 'Pending') then 1 else 0 end) as specimens_pending from catissue_coll_prot_reg cpr inner join catissue_coll_prot_event cpe on cpe.collection_protocol_id = cpr.collection_protocol_id inner join catissue_cp_req_specimen sr on sr.collection_protocol_event_id = cpe.identifier and sr.activity_status != 'Disabled' left join catissue_specimen_coll_group visit on visit.collection_protocol_event_id = cpe.identifier and visit.collection_protocol_reg_id = cpr.identifier and visit.activity_status != 'Disabled' left join catissue_specimen spmn on spmn.req_specimen_id = sr.identifier and spmn.specimen_collection_group_id = visit.identifier and spmn.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by cpr.identifier
